access_scores_mental:mental_cnt.long_name: Availability of mental health services by count
access_scores_mental:mental_cnt.short_description: Count of mental health facilities based on facility locations
access_scores_mental:mental_cnt.long_description: Count of mental health facilities based on facility locations. Location data were collected from the Homeland Infrastructure Foundation-Level Data (HIFLD) repository.
access_scores_mental:mental_cnt.statement: There are {value} mental health facilities in {features.name}.

access_scores_mental:mental_3sfca.long_name: Mental health services availability (3-step  floating catchment areas)
access_scores_mental:mental_3sfca.short_description: Index of mental health services accessibility based on supply and demand of facilities
access_scores_mental:mental_3sfca.long_description: Mental health services availability based on 3-step floating catchment areas. This method is an aggregation of facilities per population ratios weighted by distance or travel time in each catchment area (area within which a facility is accessible). Weights are defined for the demand for facilities (adult population).
access_scores_mental:mental_3sfca.statement: The mental health services availability for {features.name} is {value}.
